pageContext.claim: “And [Pelosi] always wanted to impeach. You know there's this theory that, oh she didn't want it.”
pageContext.analysis: It's the opposite — Pelosi responded to criticism of the Democrats expedience in the inquiry when Trump misconstrued her words. She immediately made clear she was talking about the Mueller investigation, saying, “I think we are not moving with speed. Was it two and a half years ago they initiated the Mueller investigation? It’s not about speed. It’s about urgency. One of the charges against the president of the United States is that he was violating his oath of office by asking for government to interfere in our election undermining the integrity of our elections,” she said.
